metadata.short_description: Reads a local csv file and displays the tabular data in an interactive dashboard.
metadata.description:
This pipeline reads tabular data from a local csv file, then displays it in a Panel interactive dashboard. Using the interactive dashboard, the user can:
* Select specific columns to display,
* Generate line plots, histograms and correlation plots,
* Visualize summary statistics about the dataset.

outputs.Expected results: Dataset visualized in an interactive Panel dashboard

dataset.value range: Tabular dataset as a pandas DataFrame

metadata.example: If necessary, illustrate how the pipeline unfolds on one of our example datasets. This can be done by including a link to a short demo video.
